titles.title: A bill to increase the authorization ceiling for the Closed Basin Division, San Luis Valley Project, Colorado.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Water and Power.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Interior Department, OMB.
Subcommittee on Water and Power. Hearings held.
Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources discharged by Unanimous Consent.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 1050.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 7/24/1987--Introduced. Amends the Reclamation Project Authorization Act of 1972 to increase the authorization of appropriations for construction and operation and maintenance of the Closed Basin Division, San Luis Valley Project, Colorado.
